channel.title: 317 npcs
channel.description:
I am adding more drops to a server, but the problem is i get this error when I add some drops... Sometimes it works, soemtimes it doesn't : [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2109) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:589) at server.main(server.java:131) [/code]
I added the drops with tabs and I am sure that I didn't mistake anything... I'm created my herb drops and I am copying pasting those changing the ids: [code]npcdrop = 100 259 1 8 npcdrop = 100 263 1 7 npcdrop = 100 265 1 5 npcdrop = 100 2481 1 4 npcdrop = 100 267 1 3 npcdrop = 100 257 1 2 npcdrop = 100 231 1 1[/code]
What am I doing wrong?

item.title: 317 npcs
item.dc:creator: @daved daved
item.description:
@daved wrote:

didn’t use spaces

Read full topic

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2109) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:589) at server.main(server.java:131)

I added the drops with tabs and I am sure that I didn’t mistake anything… I’m created my herb drops and I am copying pasting those changing the ids:

npcdrop = 100 259 1 8 npcdrop = 100 263 1 7 npcdrop = 100 265 1 5 npcdrop = 100 2481 1 4 npcdrop = 100 267 1 3 npcdrop = 100 257 1 2 npcdrop = 100 231 1 1

What am I doing wrong?[/quote]

You used spaces. Use the tab key
